extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected GitLab Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the GitLab instance is running an affected version (14.7.0 to 14.7.6, 14.8.0 to 14.8.4, or 14.9.0 to 14.9.1).

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the GitLab instance running an affected version?
Which affected version is the GitLab instance running?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade GitLab to Version 14.7.7
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the GitLab instance from version 14.7.0 to 14.7.6 to the patched version 14.7.7.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade GitLab to Version 14.8.5
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the GitLab instance from version 14.8.0 to 14.8.4 to the patched version 14.8.5.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade GitLab to Version 14.9.2
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the GitLab instance from version 14.9.0 to 14.9.1 to the patched version 14.9.2.

extracted_playbook.title: Run GitLab User Impact Script
extracted_playbook.description: Execute the script provided by GitLab developers to identify users potentially impacted by the vulnerability.

affected_products: GitLab Community Edition/Enterprise Edition: Versions 14.7 to 14.7.6
GitLab Community Edition/Enterprise Edition: Versions 14.8 to 14.8.4
GitLab Community Edition/Enterprise Edition: Versions 14.9 to 14.9.1
